title: US overtakes Italy with highest COVID-19 deaths - Mumbai Mirror

content:
Washington D.C: The total number of deaths related to the novel coronavirus
 in the United States surpassed that of Italy
 on Saturday, with at least 20,506 lives succumbing to the outbreak, and as many as 527,111 people getting infected by the contagion so… [+1327 chars]
